website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm Instax Wide 300 is a simple camera that takes photos using instant film, and can be a lot of fun to use.
pros: Uses large Instax Wide instant film
cons: Can be expensive for high-volume shooters

customer_reviews.title: Polaroid
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked at first but it wasn’t used for a few weeks after first photo taken. When it was used again, no photos worked so we took the cartridge out and had to waste the photos on it and put a new cartridge in. The camera then took more photos but then the photos stopped working, that sort of got stuck. I don’t have any product support available so I am not sure how to fix it😬 Any help would be good!?!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Nicola Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product does not work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera back in October as a present for my girlfriends birthday (which is today), she has opened it and taken it out of the box and it won't turn on. We've tried everything, different batteries etc and the camera just won't turn on. Because I purchased this camera back in October I have no option for a return and this item does not have product support. Amazon, I would appreciate if you got in contact with me as I have a faulty product and something needs to be done about this.
customer_reviews.author: Max Thomas Weir

customer_reviews.title: NOT IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: The first camera arrived took it out the box switched it on and it just constantly made clicking noises and did not work. Amazon replaced it without a problem. The second one worked for a month then stopped working had the same clicking noises as the original camera. Amazon agreed for me to return it, but would not send a replacement as they said they needed to look into why they were having problems with the cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Reed

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I have read numerous reviews and it seems there is an issue with the camera working and then stopping working. This is the case with my one and it wasted a whole pack of film. product_meta.title: instax WIDE 300 camera with 10 shots
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black| Style Name:Camera with 10 ShotsThe Fujifilm Instax Wide 300 offers more fun with photography when people get together! Compact and easy to use, this Instax Camera uses Fujifilm Instant Color Film, Instax WIDE; twice the size of Instax MINI film, to enable more subjects to be included in a photograph. With various features and functions such as automatic flash, a close-up lens, tripod socket for stable shooting and an easy to use focal zoom dial, the camera is ideal for gatherings and parties!

BOX CONTAINS
Instax Wide 300 Instant Camera 
Battery 
Strap 
Close-up lens 
Instax Wide Film Pack of 10 Shots 
Owner's Manual
feature_bullets: Built in flash & fill in flash mode
Improved ease of use of the camera includes a tripod socket, focal zoom dial and user friendly interface.
Two mode focusing, normal (0.9 m-3 m)and landscape (3 m plus)
Compatible film with instax Wide film (White) and instax wide with Monochrome
